episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_1101_0100_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] found an
old-looking coin...
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_1001_0200_: Whoa... now that’s an old coin, for sure...
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_1001_0300_:
I heard rumors that people have been finding
strange coins on Pasio lately... Could this be one
of them, I wonder?
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_1001_0500_:
If you don’t mind, would you be willing to give
that coin to me?
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_0401_0700_: Thank you! Now, if you could just—
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_0402_0900_:
Really? Ah, I see... That must mean you also
have a—
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_1001_1200_:
Apologies for the abrupt request, but...could you
do us a favor and give that coin to us instead?
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_1001_1300_: You guys are collecting them too, Sawyer?
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_1001_1400_:
Ahem! Excuse me, but I was here first. Is that not
a bit audacious of you?
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_1001_1500_:
I-I’m sorry! But we have our reasons, and we’ll
compensate you for the trouble...
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_1001_1600_:
Well, if that’s how it is, we’re all Pokémon
Trainers here...
episode_event_gimmighoul/4001_1001_1700_: Let us decide this with a battle!
episode_event_gimmighoul/4002_1101_0100_: In the end, Sawyer’s team won the coin.
episode_event_gimmighoul/4002_1001_0300_:
Sawyer and Rachel were really eager to get that
coin, weren’t they?
episode_event_gimmighoul/4002_1001_0400_:
Yeah, that collector, too. It must be pretty
valuable...
episode_event_gimmighoul/4002_1001_0500_:
Maybe you should’ve kept it after all,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_gimmighoul/4002_0301_0600_:
I want someone who needs it to
have it.
episode_event_gimmighoul/4002_0302_0800_:
I’m not sure I could find a use
for it...
episode_event_gimmighoul/4002_0402_0900_:
That’s fair. We don’t even know what it could be
used for.
episode_event_gimmighoul/4002_1001_1000_:
Well...we’ve got time on our hands, so why don’t
we ask around about those coins?
episode_event_gimmighoul/4002_1001_1100_: Ooooh, that sounds like fun! Count me in!
